ayah: حمٓ
ayah_translit: ha-meem
ayah_english: Ha Mim

ayah: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ
ayah_translit: tanzilu al-kitabi mina al-lahi al-'azizi al-'alimi
ayah_english: (The) revelation (of) the Book (is) from Allah the All-Mighty the All-Knower

ayah: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ

ayah: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوۡبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلۡعِقَابِ ذِي ٱلطَّوۡلِۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: ghafiri al-dhanbi waqabili al-tawbi shadidi al-'iqabi dhi al-tawli la ilaha illa huwa ilayhi al-masiru
ayah_english: (The) Forgiver (of) the sin and (the) Acceptor (of) [the] repentance severe (in) the punishment Owner of the abundance (There is) no god except Him to Him (is) the final return

ayah: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوۡبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلۡعِقَابِ ذِي ٱلطَّوۡلِۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

ayah: مَا يُجَٰدِلُ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَلَا يَغۡرُرۡكَ تَقَلُّبُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ
ayah_translit: ma yujadilu fi ayati al-lahi illa alladhina kafaru fala yaghrur'ka taqallubuhum fi al-biladi
ayah_english: Not dispute concerning (the) Verses (of) Allah except those who disbelieve so (let) not deceive you their movement in the cities

ayah: مَا يُجَٰدِلُ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَلَا يَغۡرُرۡكَ تَقَلُّبُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

ayah: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۖ وَهَمَّتۡ كُلُّ أُمَّةِۭ بِرَسُولِهِمۡ لِيَأۡخُذُوهُۖ وَجَٰدَلُواْ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ لِيُدۡحِضُواْ بِهِ ٱلۡحَقَّ فَأَخَذۡتُهُمۡۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عِقَابِ
ayah_translit: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nuhin wal-ahzabu min ba'dihim wahammat kullu ummatin birasulihim liyakhudhuhu wajadalu bil-batili liyud'hidu bihi al-haqa fa-akhadhtuhum fakayfa kana iqabi
ayah_english: Denied before them (the) people (of) Nuh and the factions after them after them and plotted every nation against their Messenger to seize him and they disputed by falsehood to refute thereby the truth So I seized them Then how was My penalty

ayah: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۖ وَهَمَّتۡ كُلُّ أُمَّةِۭ بِرَسُولِهِمۡ لِيَأۡخُذُوهُۖ وَجَٰدَلُواْ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ لِيُدۡحِضُواْ بِهِ ٱلۡحَقَّ فَأَخَذۡتُهُمۡۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عِقَابِ
ayah_translit: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nuhin wal-ahzabu min ba'dihim wahammat kullu ummatin birasulihim liyakhudhuhu wajadalu bil-batili liyud'hidu bihi al-haqa fa-akhadhtuhum fakayfa kana iqabi
ayah_english: Denied before them (the) people (of) Nuh and the factions after them after them and plotted every nation against their Messenger to seize him and they disputed by falsehood to refute thereby the truth So I seized them Then how was My penalty

ayah: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۖ وَهَمَّتۡ كُلُّ أُمَّةِۭ بِرَسُولِهِمۡ لِيَأۡخُذُوهُۖ وَجَٰدَلُواْ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ لِيُدۡحِضُواْ بِهِ ٱلۡحَقَّ فَأَخَذۡتُهُمۡۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عِقَابِ

ayah_english: Denied before them (the) people (of) Nuh and the factions after them after them and plotted every nation against their Messenger to seize him and they disputed by falsehood to refute thereby the truth So I seized them Then how was My penalty

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: wakadhalika haqqat kalimatu rabbika ala alladhina kafaru annahum ashabu al-nari
ayah_english: And thus has been justified (the) Word (of) your Lord against those who disbelieved that they (are) companions (of) the Fire

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يَحۡمِلُونَ ٱلۡعَرۡشَ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهُۥ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَيُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۖ رَبَّنَا وَسِعۡتَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٖ رَّحۡمَةٗ وَعِلۡمٗا فَٱغۡفِرۡ لِلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ سَبِيلَكَ وَقِهِمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
ayah_translit: alladhina yahmiluna al-'arsha waman hawlahu yusabbihuna bihamdi rabbihim wayu'minuna bihi wayastaghfiruna lilladhina amanu rabbana wasi'ta kulla shayin rahmatan wa'il'man fa-igh'fir lilladhina tabu wa-ittaba'u sabilaka waqihim adhaba al-jahimi
ayah_english: Those who bear the Throne and those around it glorify (the) praises (of) their Lord and believe in Him and ask forgiveness for those who believe Our Lord! You encompass all things (by Your) Mercy and knowledge so forgive those who repent and follow Your Way and save them (from) (the) punishment (of) the Hellfire

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يَحۡمِلُونَ ٱلۡعَرۡشَ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهُۥ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَيُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۖ رَبَّنَا وَسِعۡتَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٖ رَّحۡمَةٗ وَعِلۡمٗا فَٱغۡفِرۡ لِلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ سَبِيلَكَ وَقِهِمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

ayah_translit: alladhina yahmiluna al-'arsha waman hawlahu yusabbihuna bihamdi rabbihim wayu'minuna bihi wayastaghfiruna lilladhina amanu rabbana wasi'ta kulla shayin rahmatan wa'il'man fa-igh'fir lilladhina tabu wa-ittaba'u sabilaka waqihim adhaba al-jahimi
ayah_english: Those who bear the Throne and those around it glorify (the) praises (of) their Lord and believe in Him and ask forgiveness for those who believe Our Lord! You encompass all things (by Your) Mercy and knowledge so forgive those who repent and follow Your Way and save them (from) (the) punishment (of) the Hellfire

ayah: رَبَّنَا وَأَدۡخِلۡهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدتَّهُمۡ وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنۡ ءَابَآئِهِمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِهِمۡۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: rabbana wa-adkhil'hum jannati adnin allati wa'adttahum waman salaha min abaihim wa-azwajihim wadhurriyyatihim innaka anta al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: Our Lord! And admit them (to) Gardens (of) Eden which You have promised them and whoever (was) righteous among their fathers and their spouses and their offspring Indeed You You (are) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: وَقِهِمُ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِۚ وَمَن تَقِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَقَدۡ رَحِمۡتَهُۥۚ وَذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
ayah_translit: waqihimu al-sayiati waman taqi al-sayiati yawma-idhin faqad rahim'tahu wadhalika huwa al-fawzu al-'azimu
ayah_english: And protect them (from) the evils And whoever you protect (from) the evils (that) Day then verily You bestowed Mercy on him And that [it] (is) the success the great

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُنَادَوۡنَ لَمَقۡتُ ٱللَّهِ أَكۡبَرُ مِن مَّقۡتِكُمۡ أَنفُسَكُمۡ إِذۡ تُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ فَتَكۡفُرُونَ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina kafaru yunadawna lamaqtu al-lahi akbaru min maqtikum anfusakum idh tud'awna ila al-imani fatakfuruna
ayah_english: Indeed those who disbelieved will be cried out to them (Allah's) hatred Allah's (hatred) (was) greater than your hatred (of) yourselves when you were called to the faith and you disbelieved

ayah: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ أَمَتَّنَا ٱثۡنَتَيۡنِ وَأَحۡيَيۡتَنَا ٱثۡنَتَيۡنِ فَٱعۡتَرَفۡنَا بِذُنُوبِنَا فَهَلۡ إِلَىٰ خُرُوجٖ مِّن سَبِيلٖ
ayah_translit: qalu rabbana amattana ith'natayni wa-ahyaytana ith'natayni fa-i'tarafna bidhunubina fahal ila khurujin min sabilin
ayah_english: They (will) say Our Lord! You gave us death twice and You gave us life twice and we confess our sins So is (there) to get out any way

ayah_english: They (will) say Our Lord! You gave us death twice and You gave us life twice and we confess our sins So is (there) to get out any way

ayah: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ أَمَتَّنَا ٱثۡنَتَيۡنِ وَأَحۡيَيۡتَنَا ٱثۡنَتَيۡنِ فَٱعۡتَرَفۡنَا بِذُنُوبِنَا فَهَلۡ إِلَىٰ خُرُوجٖ مِّن سَبِيلٖ

ayah: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّهُۥٓ إِذَا دُعِيَ ٱللَّهُ وَحۡدَهُۥ كَفَرۡتُمۡ وَإِن يُشۡرَكۡ بِهِۦ تُؤۡمِنُواْۚ فَٱلۡحُكۡمُ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡعَلِيِّ ٱلۡكَبِيرِ
ayah_translit: dhalikum bi-annahu idha du'iya al-lahu wahdahu kafartum wa-in yush'rak bihi tu'minu fal-huk'mu lillahi al-'aliyi al-kabiri
ayah_english: That (is) because when Allah was invoked Allah was invoked Alone you disbelieved but if (others) were associated with Him you believed So the judgment (is) with Allah the Most High the Most Great

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزۡقٗاۚ وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi yurikum ayatihi wayunazzilu lakum mina al-samai riz'qan wama yatadhakkaru illa man yunibu
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who shows you His Signs and sends down for you from the sky provision But (does) not take heed except (one) who turns

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزۡقٗاۚ وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزۡقٗاۚ وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi yurikum ayatihi wayunazzilu lakum mina al-samai riz'qan wama yatadhakkaru illa man yunibu
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who shows you His Signs and sends down for you from the sky provision But (does) not take heed except (one) who turns

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزۡقٗاۚ وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ

ayah_english: He (is) the One Who shows you His Signs and sends down for you from the sky provision But (does) not take heed except (one) who turns

ayah: فَٱدۡعُواْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-id'u al-laha mukh'lisina lahu al-dina walaw kariha al-kafiruna
ayah_english: So invoke Allah (being) sincere to Him (in) the religion even though dislike (it) the disbelievers

ayah: فَٱدۡعُواْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

ayah: رَفِيعُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتِ ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ يُلۡقِي ٱلرُّوحَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِهِۦ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ لِيُنذِرَ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّلَاقِ
ayah_translit: rafi'u al-darajati dhu al-'arshi yul'qi al-ruha min amrihi ala man yashau min ibadihi liyundhira yawma al-talaqi
ayah_english: Possessor of the Highest Ranks Possessor of the Highest Ranks Owner of the Throne He places the inspiration by His Command upon whom He wills of His slaves to warn (of the) Day (of) the Meeting

ayah: يَوۡمَ هُم بَٰرِزُونَۖ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِنۡهُمۡ شَيۡءٞۚ لِّمَنِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ
ayah_translit: yawma hum barizuna la yakhfa ala al-lahi min'hum shayon limani al-mul'ku al-yawma lillahi al-wahidi al-qahari
ayah_english: (The) Day they come forth not is hidden from Allah about them anything For whom (is) the Dominion this Day For Allah the One the Irresistible

ayah: يَوۡمَ هُم بَٰرِزُونَۖ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِنۡهُمۡ شَيۡءٞۚ لِّمَنِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ

ayah: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡۚ لَا ظُلۡمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
ayah_translit: al-yawma tuj'za kullu nafsin bima kasabat la zul'ma al-yawma inna al-laha sari'u al-hisabi
ayah_english: This Day will be recompensed every soul for what it earned No injustice today! Indeed Allah (is) Swift (in) Account

ayah: وَأَنذِرۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓزِفَةِ إِذِ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ لَدَى ٱلۡحَنَاجِرِ كَٰظِمِينَۚ مَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِنۡ حَمِيمٖ وَلَا شَفِيعٖ يُطَاعُ
ayah_translit: wa-andhir'hum yawma al-azifati idhi al-qulubu lada al-hanajiri kazimina ma lilzzalimina min hamimin wala shafi'in yuta'u
ayah_english: And warn them (of the) Day the Approaching when the hearts (are) at the throats choked Not for the wrongdoers any intimate friend and no intercessor (who) is obeyed

ayah: وَأَنذِرۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓزِفَةِ إِذِ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ لَدَى ٱلۡحَنَاجِرِ كَٰظِمِينَۚ مَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِنۡ حَمِيمٖ وَلَا شَفِيعٖ يُطَاعُ

ayah: يَعۡلَمُ خَآئِنَةَ ٱلۡأَعۡيُنِ وَمَا تُخۡفِي ٱلصُّدُورُ
ayah_translit: ya'lamu khainata al-a'yuni wama tukh'fi al-suduru
ayah_english: He knows (the) stealthy glance (the) stealthy glance and what conceal the breasts

ayah: وَٱللَّهُ يَقۡضِي بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَقۡضُونَ بِشَيۡءٍۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡبَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: wal-lahu yaqdi bil-haqi wa-alladhina yad'una min dunihi la yaqduna bishayin inna al-laha huwa al-sami'u al-basiru
ayah_english: And Allah judges in truth while those (whom) they invoke besides Him besides Him not they judge with anything Indeed Allah He (is) the All-Hearer the All-Seer

ayah_english: And Allah judges in truth while those (whom) they invoke besides Him besides Him not they judge with anything Indeed Allah He (is) the All-Hearer the All-Seer

ayah: ۞أَوَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَانُواْ هُمۡ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُمۡ قُوَّةٗ وَءَاثَارٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡ وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَاقٖ
ayah_translit: awalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina kanu min qablihim kanu hum ashadda min'hum quwwatan waatharan fi al-ardi fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunubihim wama kana lahum mina al-lahi min waqin
ayah_english: Do not they travel in the earth and see how was (the) end (of) those who were before them before them They were [they] superior to them (in) strength and (in) impressions in the land but Allah seized them but Allah seized them for their sins and not was for them against Allah any protector

ayah_english: Do not they travel in the earth and see how was (the) end (of) those who were before them before them They were [they] superior to them (in) strength and (in) impressions in the land but Allah seized them but Allah seized them for their sins and not was for them against Allah any protector

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَانَت تَّأۡتِيهِمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَكَفَرُواْ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ قَوِيّٞ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-annahum kanat tatihim rusuluhum bil-bayinati fakafaru fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu innahu qawiyyun shadidu al-'iqabi
ayah_english: That (was) because [they] used to come to them used to come to them their Messengers with clear proofs but they disbelieved So Allah seized them So Allah seized them Indeed, He (is) All-Strong severe (in) punishment

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ
ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna musa biayatina wasul'tanin mubinin
ayah_english: And certainly We sent Musa with Our Signs and an authority clear

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

ayah: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَقَٰرُونَ فَقَالُواْ سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٞ
ayah_translit: ila fir'awna wahamana waqaruna faqalu sahirun kadhabun
ayah_english: To Firaun Haman and Qarun but they said A magician a liar

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ مِنۡ عِندِنَا قَالُواْ ٱقۡتُلُوٓاْ أَبۡنَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥ وَٱسۡتَحۡيُواْ نِسَآءَهُمۡۚ وَمَا كَيۡدُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ
ayah_translit: falamma jaahum bil-haqi min indina qalu uq'tulu abnaa alladhina amanu ma'ahu wa-is'tahyu nisaahum wama kaydu al-kafirina illa fi dalalin
ayah_english: Then when he brought to them the truth from Us they said Kill (the) sons (of) those who believe with him and let live their women And not (is the) plot (of) the disbelievers but in error

ayah: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ذَرُونِيٓ أَقۡتُلۡ مُوسَىٰ وَلۡيَدۡعُ رَبَّهُۥٓۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُبَدِّلَ دِينَكُمۡ أَوۡ أَن يُظۡهِرَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡفَسَادَ
ayah_translit: waqala fir'awnu dharuni aqtul musa walyad'u rabbahu inni akhafu an yubaddila dinakum aw an yuz'hira fi al-ardi al-fasada
ayah_english: And said Firaun Leave me (so that) I kill Musa and let him call his Lord Indeed I [I] fear that he will change your religion or that he may cause to appear in the land the corruption

ayah: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ذَرُونِيٓ أَقۡتُلۡ مُوسَىٰ وَلۡيَدۡعُ رَبَّهُۥٓۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُبَدِّلَ دِينَكُمۡ أَوۡ أَن يُظۡهِرَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡفَسَادَ

ayah: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُم مِّن كُلِّ مُتَكَبِّرٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
ayah_translit: waqala musa inni udh'tu birabbi warabbikum min kulli mutakabbirin la yu'minu biyawmi al-hisabi
ayah_english: And said Musa Indeed I [I] seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant one not who believes (in the) Day (of) the Account

ayah_english: And said Musa Indeed I [I] seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant one not who believes (in the) Day (of) the Account

ayah: وَقَالَ رَجُلٞ مُّؤۡمِنٞ مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَكۡتُمُ إِيمَٰنَهُۥٓ أَتَقۡتُلُونَ رَجُلًا أَن يَقُولَ رَبِّيَ ٱللَّهُ وَقَدۡ جَآءَكُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ مِن رَّبِّكُمۡۖ وَإِن يَكُ كَٰذِبٗا فَعَلَيۡهِ كَذِبُهُۥۖ وَإِن يَكُ صَادِقٗا يُصِبۡكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي يَعِدُكُمۡۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي مَنۡ هُوَ مُسۡرِفٞ كَذَّابٞ
ayah_translit: waqala rajulun mu'minun min ali fir'awna yaktumu imanahu ataqtuluna rajulan an yaqula rabbiya al-lahu waqad jaakum bil-bayinati min rabbikum wa-in yaku kadhiban fa'alayhi kadhibuhu wa-in yaku sadiqan yusib'kum ba'du alladhi ya'idukum inna al-laha la yahdi man huwa mus'rifun kadhabun
ayah_english: And said a man believing from (the) family (of) Firaun who conceal(ed) his faith Will you kill a man because he says My Lord (is) Allah and indeed he has brought you clear proofs from your Lord And if he is a liar then upon him (is) his lie and if he is truthful (there) will strike you some (of) (that) which he threatens you Indeed Allah (does) not guide (one) who [he] (is) a transgressor a liar

ayah: وَقَالَ رَجُلٞ مُّؤۡمِنٞ مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَكۡتُمُ إِيمَٰنَهُۥٓ أَتَقۡتُلُونَ رَجُلًا أَن يَقُولَ رَبِّيَ ٱللَّهُ وَقَدۡ جَآءَكُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ مِن رَّبِّكُمۡۖ وَإِن يَكُ كَٰذِبٗا فَعَلَيۡهِ كَذِبُهُۥۖ وَإِن يَكُ صَادِقٗا يُصِبۡكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي يَعِدُكُمۡۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي مَنۡ هُوَ مُسۡرِفٞ كَذَّابٞ

ayah_english: And said a man believing from (the) family (of) Firaun who conceal(ed) his faith Will you kill a man because he says My Lord (is) Allah and indeed he has brought you clear proofs from your Lord And if he is a liar then upon him (is) his lie and if he is truthful (there) will strike you some (of) (that) which he threatens you Indeed Allah (does) not guide (one) who [he] (is) a transgressor a liar

ayah: وَقَالَ رَجُلٞ مُّؤۡمِنٞ مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَكۡتُمُ إِيمَٰنَهُۥٓ أَتَقۡتُلُونَ رَجُلًا أَن يَقُولَ رَبِّيَ ٱللَّهُ وَقَدۡ جَآءَكُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ مِن رَّبِّكُمۡۖ وَإِن يَكُ كَٰذِبٗا فَعَلَيۡهِ كَذِبُهُۥۖ وَإِن يَكُ صَادِقٗا يُصِبۡكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي يَعِدُكُمۡۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي مَنۡ هُوَ مُسۡرِفٞ كَذَّابٞ
ayah_translit: waqala rajulun mu'minun min ali fir'awna yaktumu imanahu ataqtuluna rajulan an yaqula rabbiya al-lahu waqad jaakum bil-bayinati min rabbikum wa-in yaku kadhiban fa'alayhi kadhibuhu wa-in yaku sadiqan yusib'kum ba'du alladhi ya'idukum inna al-laha la yahdi man huwa mus'rifun kadhabun

ayah: يَٰقَوۡمِ لَكُمُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ظَٰهِرِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَمَن يَنصُرُنَا مِنۢ بَأۡسِ ٱللَّهِ إِن جَآءَنَاۚ قَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ مَآ أُرِيكُمۡ إِلَّا مَآ أَرَىٰ وَمَآ أَهۡدِيكُمۡ إِلَّا سَبِيلَ ٱلرَّشَادِ
ayah_translit: yaqawmi lakumu al-mul'ku al-yawma zahirina fi al-ardi faman yansuruna min basi al-lahi in jaana qala fir'awnu ma urikum illa ma ara wama ahdikum illa sabila al-rashadi
ayah_english: O my people! For you (is) the kingdom today dominant in the land but who will help us from (the) punishment (of) Allah if it came to us Said Firaun Not I show you except what I see and not I guide you except (to the) path the right

ayah: يَٰقَوۡمِ لَكُمُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ظَٰهِرِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَمَن يَنصُرُنَا مِنۢ بَأۡسِ ٱللَّهِ إِن جَآءَنَاۚ قَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ مَآ أُرِيكُمۡ إِلَّا مَآ أَرَىٰ وَمَآ أَهۡدِيكُمۡ إِلَّا سَبِيلَ ٱلرَّشَادِ

ayah_english: O my people! For you (is) the kingdom today dominant in the land but who will help us from (the) punishment (of) Allah if it came to us Said Firaun Not I show you except what I see and not I guide you except (to the) path the right

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُم مِّثۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhi amana yaqawmi inni akhafu alaykum mith'la yawmi al-ahzabi
ayah_english: And said (he) who believed O my people! Indeed I [I] fear for you like (the) day (of) the companies

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُم مِّثۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ

ayah: مِثۡلَ دَأۡبِ قَوۡمِ نُوحٖ وَعَادٖ وَثَمُودَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۚ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ظُلۡمٗا لِّلۡعِبَادِ
ayah_translit: mith'la dabi qawmi nuhin wa'adin wathamuda wa-alladhina min ba'dihim wama al-lahu yuridu zul'man lil'ibadi
ayah_english: Like (the) plight (of the) people (of) Nuh and Aad and Thamud and those after them after them does not Allah want injustice for (His) slaves

ayah_english: Like (the) plight (of the) people (of) Nuh and Aad and Thamud and those after them after them does not Allah want injustice for (His) slaves

ayah: مِثۡلَ دَأۡبِ قَوۡمِ نُوحٖ وَعَادٖ وَثَمُودَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۚ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ظُلۡمٗا لِّلۡعِبَادِ

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّنَادِ
ayah_translit: wayaqawmi inni akhafu alaykum yawma al-tanadi
ayah_english: And O my people! Indeed I [I] fear for you (the) Day (of) Calling

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّنَادِ

ayah_translit: wayaqawmi inni akhafu alaykum yawma al-tanadi
ayah_english: And O my people! Indeed I [I] fear for you (the) Day (of) Calling

ayah: يَوۡمَ تُوَلُّونَ مُدۡبِرِينَ مَا لَكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ عَاصِمٖۗ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٖ
ayah_translit: yawma tuwalluna mud'birina ma lakum mina al-lahi min asimin waman yud'lili al-lahu fama lahu min hadin
ayah_english: A Day you will turn back fleeing not for you from Allah any protector And whoever Allah lets go astray Allah lets go astray then not for him any guide

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَكُمۡ يُوسُفُ مِن قَبۡلُ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَمَا زِلۡتُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّمَّا جَآءَكُم بِهِۦۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا هَلَكَ قُلۡتُمۡ لَن يَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ رَسُولٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَنۡ هُوَ مُسۡرِفٞ مُّرۡتَابٌ
ayah_translit: walaqad jaakum yusufu min qablu bil-bayinati fama zil'tum fi shakkin mimma jaakum bihi hatta idha halaka qul'tum lan yab'atha al-lahu min ba'dihi rasulan kadhalika yudillu al-lahu man huwa mus'rifun mur'tabun
ayah_english: And indeed came to you Yusuf before before with clear proofs but not you ceased in doubt about what he brought to you [with it] until when he died you said Never will Allah raise will Allah raise after him after him a Messenger Thus Allah lets go astray Allah lets go astray who [he] (is) a transgressor a doubter

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَكُمۡ يُوسُفُ مِن قَبۡلُ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَمَا زِلۡتُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّمَّا جَآءَكُم بِهِۦۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا هَلَكَ قُلۡتُمۡ لَن يَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ رَسُولٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَنۡ هُوَ مُسۡرِفٞ مُّرۡتَابٌ

ayah_translit: walaqad jaakum yusufu min qablu bil-bayinati fama zil'tum fi shakkin mimma jaakum bihi hatta idha halaka qul'tum lan yab'atha al-lahu min ba'dihi rasulan kadhalika yudillu al-lahu man huwa mus'rifun mur'tabun

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ سُلۡطَٰنٍ أَتَىٰهُمۡۖ كَبُرَ مَقۡتًا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَعِندَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَطۡبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ قَلۡبِ مُتَكَبِّرٖ جَبَّارٖ
ayah_translit: alladhina yujadiluna fi ayati al-lahi bighayri sul'tanin atahum kabura maqtan inda al-lahi wa'inda alladhina amanu kadhalika yatba'u al-lahu ala kulli qalbi mutakabbirin jabbarin
ayah_english: Those who dispute concerning (the) Signs (of) Allah without any authority (having) come to them (it) is greatly (in) hateful near Allah near Allah and near those who believe Thus Allah sets a seal Allah sets a seal over every heart (of) an arrogant tyrant

ayah_english: Those who dispute concerning (the) Signs (of) Allah without any authority (having) come to them (it) is greatly (in) hateful near Allah near Allah and near those who believe Thus Allah sets a seal Allah sets a seal over every heart (of) an arrogant tyrant

ayah_english: Those who dispute concerning (the) Signs (of) Allah without any authority (having) come to them (it) is greatly (in) hateful near Allah near Allah and near those who believe Thus Allah sets a seal Allah sets a seal over every heart (of) an arrogant tyrant

ayah: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ يَٰهَٰمَٰنُ ٱبۡنِ لِي صَرۡحٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ أَبۡلُغُ ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبَ
ayah_translit: waqala fir'awnu yahamanu ib'ni li sarhan la'alli ablughu al-asbaba
ayah_english: And said Firaun O Haman! Construct for me a tower that I may reach the ways

ayah: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ يَٰهَٰمَٰنُ ٱبۡنِ لِي صَرۡحٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ أَبۡلُغُ ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبَ

ayah_english: And said Firaun O Haman! Construct for me a tower that I may reach the ways

ayah: أَسۡبَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ فَأَطَّلِعَ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَٰهِ مُوسَىٰ وَإِنِّي لَأَظُنُّهُۥ كَٰذِبٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ وَصُدَّ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِۚ وَمَا كَيۡدُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِلَّا فِي تَبَابٖ
ayah_translit: asbaba al-samawati fa-attali'a ila ilahi musa wa-inni la-azunnuhu kadhiban wakadhalika zuyyina lifir'awna suu amalihi wasudda ani al-sabili wama kaydu fir'awna illa fi tababin
ayah_english: (The) ways (to) the heavens so I may look at (the) God (of) Musa and indeed I [I] surely think him (to be) a liar And thus was made fair-seeming to Firaun (the) evil (of) his deed and he was averted from the way And not (was the) plot (of) Firaun except in ruin

ayah: أَسۡبَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ فَأَطَّلِعَ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَٰهِ مُوسَىٰ وَإِنِّي لَأَظُنُّهُۥ كَٰذِبٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ وَصُدَّ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِۚ وَمَا كَيۡدُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِلَّا فِي تَبَابٖ

ayah: أَسۡبَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ فَأَطَّلِعَ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَٰهِ مُوسَىٰ وَإِنِّي لَأَظُنُّهُۥ كَٰذِبٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ وَصُدَّ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِۚ وَمَا كَيۡدُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِلَّا فِي تَبَابٖ

ayah: أَسۡبَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ فَأَطَّلِعَ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَٰهِ مُوسَىٰ وَإِنِّي لَأَظُنُّهُۥ كَٰذِبٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ وَصُدَّ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِۚ وَمَا كَيۡدُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِلَّا فِي تَبَابٖ
ayah_translit: asbaba al-samawati fa-attali'a ila ilahi musa wa-inni la-azunnuhu kadhiban wakadhalika zuyyina lifir'awna suu amalihi wasudda ani al-sabili wama kaydu fir'awna illa fi tababin

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُونِ أَهۡدِكُمۡ سَبِيلَ ٱلرَّشَادِ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhi amana yaqawmi ittabi'uni ahdikum sabila al-rashadi
ayah_english: And said the one who believed O my people! Follow me I will guide you (to the) way the right

ayah: يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنَّمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَتَٰعٞ وَإِنَّ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ هِيَ دَارُ ٱلۡقَرَارِ
ayah_translit: yaqawmi innama hadhihi al-hayatu al-dun'ya mata'un wa-inna al-akhirata hiya daru al-qarari
ayah_english: O my people! Only this the life (of) the world (is) enjoyment and indeed the Hereafter it (is the) home (of) settlement

ayah: يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنَّمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَتَٰعٞ وَإِنَّ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ هِيَ دَارُ ٱلۡقَرَارِ

ayah: مَنۡ عَمِلَ سَيِّئَةٗ فَلَا يُجۡزَىٰٓ إِلَّا مِثۡلَهَاۖ وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ يُرۡزَقُونَ فِيهَا بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ
ayah_translit: man amila sayyi-atan fala yuj'za illa mith'laha waman amila salihan min dhakarin aw untha wahuwa mu'minun fa-ulaika yadkhuluna al-janata yur'zaquna fiha bighayri hisabin
ayah_english: Whoever does an evil then not he will be recompensed but (the) like thereof and whoever does righteousness whether male or female while he (is) a believer then those will enter Paradise they will be given provision in it without account

ayah: مَنۡ عَمِلَ سَيِّئَةٗ فَلَا يُجۡزَىٰٓ إِلَّا مِثۡلَهَاۖ وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ يُرۡزَقُونَ فِيهَا بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ

ayah: مَنۡ عَمِلَ سَيِّئَةٗ فَلَا يُجۡزَىٰٓ إِلَّا مِثۡلَهَاۖ وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ يُرۡزَقُونَ فِيهَا بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ

ayah_english: Whoever does an evil then not he will be recompensed but (the) like thereof and whoever does righteousness whether male or female while he (is) a believer then those will enter Paradise they will be given provision in it without account

ayah: ۞وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَا لِيٓ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلنَّجَوٰةِ وَتَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: wayaqawmi ma li ad'ukum ila al-najati watad'unani ila al-nari
ayah_english: And O my people! How (is it) for me (that) I call you to the salvation while you call me to the Fire!

ayah: ۞وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَا لِيٓ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلنَّجَوٰةِ وَتَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ

ayah: ۞وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَا لِيٓ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلنَّجَوٰةِ وَتَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: wayaqawmi ma li ad'ukum ila al-najati watad'unani ila al-nari
ayah_english: And O my people! How (is it) for me (that) I call you to the salvation while you call me to the Fire!

ayah: تَدۡعُونَنِي لِأَكۡفُرَ بِٱللَّهِ وَأُشۡرِكَ بِهِۦ مَا لَيۡسَ لِي بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ وَأَنَا۠ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡغَفَّـٰرِ
ayah_translit: tad'unani li-akfura bil-lahi wa-ush'rika bihi ma laysa li bihi il'mun wa-ana ad'ukum ila al-'azizi al-ghafari
ayah_english: You call me that I disbelieve in Allah and (to) associate with Him what not for me of it any knowledge and I call you to the All-Mighty the Oft-Forgiving

ayah: تَدۡعُونَنِي لِأَكۡفُرَ بِٱللَّهِ وَأُشۡرِكَ بِهِۦ مَا لَيۡسَ لِي بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ وَأَنَا۠ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡغَفَّـٰرِ

ayah: تَدۡعُونَنِي لِأَكۡفُرَ بِٱللَّهِ وَأُشۡرِكَ بِهِۦ مَا لَيۡسَ لِي بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ وَأَنَا۠ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡغَفَّـٰرِ

ayah_english: You call me that I disbelieve in Allah and (to) associate with Him what not for me of it any knowledge and I call you to the All-Mighty the Oft-Forgiving

ayah: تَدۡعُونَنِي لِأَكۡفُرَ بِٱللَّهِ وَأُشۡرِكَ بِهِۦ مَا لَيۡسَ لِي بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ وَأَنَا۠ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡغَفَّـٰرِ
ayah_translit: tad'unani li-akfura bil-lahi wa-ush'rika bihi ma laysa li bihi il'mun wa-ana ad'ukum ila al-'azizi al-ghafari
ayah_english: You call me that I disbelieve in Allah and (to) associate with Him what not for me of it any knowledge and I call you to the All-Mighty the Oft-Forgiving

ayah: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّمَا تَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ لَيۡسَ لَهُۥ دَعۡوَةٞ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَنَّ مَرَدَّنَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: la jarama annama tad'unani ilayhi laysa lahu da'watun fi al-dun'ya wala fi al-akhirati wa-anna maraddana ila al-lahi wa-anna al-mus'rifina hum ashabu al-nari
ayah_english: No doubt that what you call me to it not for it a claim in the world and not in the Hereafter and that our return (is) to Allah and that the transgressors they (will be the) companions (of) the Fire

ayah: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّمَا تَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ لَيۡسَ لَهُۥ دَعۡوَةٞ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَنَّ مَرَدَّنَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ

ayah_english: No doubt that what you call me to it not for it a claim in the world and not in the Hereafter and that our return (is) to Allah and that the transgressors they (will be the) companions (of) the Fire

ayah: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّمَا تَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ لَيۡسَ لَهُۥ دَعۡوَةٞ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَنَّ مَرَدَّنَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ

ayah: فَسَتَذۡكُرُونَ مَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمۡۚ وَأُفَوِّضُ أَمۡرِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَصِيرُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ
ayah_translit: fasatadhkuruna ma aqulu lakum wa-ufawwidu amri ila al-lahi inna al-laha basirun bil-'ibadi
ayah_english: And you will remember what I say to you and I entrust my affair to Allah Indeed Allah (is) All-Seer of (His) slaves

ayah: فَوَقَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِ مَا مَكَرُواْۖ وَحَاقَ بِـَٔالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
ayah_translit: fawaqahu al-lahu sayyiati ma makaru wahaqa biali fir'awna suu al-'adhabi
ayah_english: So Allah protected him So Allah protected him (from the) evils that they plotted and enveloped (the) people (of) Firaun (the) worst punishment

ayah: فَوَقَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِ مَا مَكَرُواْۖ وَحَاقَ بِـَٔالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

ayah: ٱلنَّارُ يُعۡرَضُونَ عَلَيۡهَا غُدُوّٗا وَعَشِيّٗاۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡخِلُوٓاْ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ أَشَدَّ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
ayah_translit: al-naru yu'raduna alayha ghuduwwan wa'ashiyyan wayawma taqumu al-sa'atu adkhilu ala fir'awna ashadda al-'adhabi
ayah_english: The Fire they are exposed to it morning and evening And (the) Day (will be) established the Hour Cause to enter (the) people (of) Firaun (in the) severest punishment

ayah: ٱلنَّارُ يُعۡرَضُونَ عَلَيۡهَا غُدُوّٗا وَعَشِيّٗاۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡخِلُوٓاْ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ أَشَدَّ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

ayah: ٱلنَّارُ يُعۡرَضُونَ عَلَيۡهَا غُدُوّٗا وَعَشِيّٗاۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡخِلُوٓاْ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ أَشَدَّ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

ayah_english: The Fire they are exposed to it morning and evening And (the) Day (will be) established the Hour Cause to enter (the) people (of) Firaun (in the) severest punishment

ayah: وَإِذۡ يَتَحَآجُّونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ فَيَقُولُ ٱلضُّعَفَـٰٓؤُاْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا لَكُمۡ تَبَعٗا فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّغۡنُونَ عَنَّا نَصِيبٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: wa-idh yatahajjuna fi al-nari fayaqulu al-du'afau lilladhina is'takbaru inna kunna lakum taba'an fahal antum mugh'nuna anna nasiban mina al-nari
ayah_english: And when they will dispute in the Fire then will say the weak to those who were arrogant Indeed we [we] were for you followers so can you avert from us a portion of the Fire

ayah: وَإِذۡ يَتَحَآجُّونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ فَيَقُولُ ٱلضُّعَفَـٰٓؤُاْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا لَكُمۡ تَبَعٗا فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّغۡنُونَ عَنَّا نَصِيبٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ

ayah: وَإِذۡ يَتَحَآجُّونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ فَيَقُولُ ٱلضُّعَفَـٰٓؤُاْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا لَكُمۡ تَبَعٗا فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّغۡنُونَ عَنَّا نَصِيبٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: wa-idh yatahajjuna fi al-nari fayaqulu al-du'afau lilladhina is'takbaru inna kunna lakum taba'an fahal antum mugh'nuna anna nasiban mina al-nari
ayah_english: And when they will dispute in the Fire then will say the weak to those who were arrogant Indeed we [we] were for you followers so can you avert from us a portion of the Fire

ayah: وَإِذۡ يَتَحَآجُّونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ فَيَقُولُ ٱلضُّعَفَـٰٓؤُاْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا لَكُمۡ تَبَعٗا فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّغۡنُونَ عَنَّا نَصِيبٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: wa-idh yatahajjuna fi al-nari fayaqulu al-du'afau lilladhina is'takbaru inna kunna lakum taba'an fahal antum mugh'nuna anna nasiban mina al-nari
ayah_english: And when they will dispute in the Fire then will say the weak to those who were arrogant Indeed we [we] were for you followers so can you avert from us a portion of the Fire

ayah: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُلّٞ فِيهَآ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ حَكَمَ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡعِبَادِ
ayah_translit: qala alladhina is'takbaru inna kullun fiha inna al-laha qad hakama bayna al-'ibadi
ayah_english: Will say those who (were) arrogant Indeed we all (are) in it Indeed Allah certainly has judged between (His) slaves

ayah: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُلّٞ فِيهَآ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ حَكَمَ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡعِبَادِ

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ لِخَزَنَةِ جَهَنَّمَ ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ يُخَفِّفۡ عَنَّا يَوۡمٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina fi al-nari likhazanati jahannama id'u rabbakum yukhaffif anna yawman mina al-'adhabi
ayah_english: And will say those in the Fire to (the) keepers (of) Hell Call your Lord (to) lighten for us a day of the punishment

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ لِخَزَنَةِ جَهَنَّمَ ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ يُخَفِّفۡ عَنَّا يَوۡمٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ أَوَلَمۡ تَكُ تَأۡتِيكُمۡ رُسُلُكُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِۖ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰۚ قَالُواْ فَٱدۡعُواْۗ وَمَا دُعَـٰٓؤُاْ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٍ
ayah_translit: qalu awalam taku tatikum rusulukum bil-bayinati qalu bala qalu fa-id'u wama du'au al-kafirina illa fi dalalin
ayah_english: They (will) say Did there not Did there not come to you your Messengers with clear proofs They (will) say Yes They (will) say Then call but not (is) the call (of) the disbelievers except in error

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ أَوَلَمۡ تَكُ تَأۡتِيكُمۡ رُسُلُكُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِۖ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰۚ قَالُواْ فَٱدۡعُواْۗ وَمَا دُعَـٰٓؤُاْ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٍ
ayah_translit: qalu awalam taku tatikum rusulukum bil-bayinati qalu bala qalu fa-id'u wama du'au al-kafirina illa fi dalalin

ayah: إِنَّا لَنَنصُرُ رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَيَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡأَشۡهَٰدُ
ayah_translit: inna lanansuru rusulana wa-alladhina amanu fi al-hayati al-dun'ya wayawma yaqumu al-ashhadu
ayah_english: Indeed We We will surely help Our Messengers and those who believe in the life (of) the world and (on the) Day (when) will stand the witnesses

ayah: يَوۡمَ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مَعۡذِرَتُهُمۡۖ وَلَهُمُ ٱللَّعۡنَةُ وَلَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلدَّارِ
ayah_translit: yawma la yanfa'u al-zalimina ma'dhiratuhum walahumu al-la'natu walahum suu al-dari
ayah_english: (The) Day not will benefit the wrongdoers their excuse and for them (is) the curse and for them (is the) worst home

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَأَوۡرَثۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ
ayah_translit: walaqad atayna musa al-huda wa-awrathna bani is'raila al-kitaba
ayah_english: And certainly We gave Musa the guidance and We caused to inherit (the) Children of Israel (the) Children of Israel the Book

ayah_english: And certainly We gave Musa the guidance and We caused to inherit (the) Children of Israel (the) Children of Israel the Book

ayah: هُدٗى وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
ayah_translit: hudan wadhik'ra li-uli al-albabi
ayah_english: A guide and a reminder for those (of) understanding

ayah: هُدٗى وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

ayah: فَٱصۡبِرۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لِذَنۢبِكَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ وَٱلۡإِبۡكَٰرِ
ayah_translit: fa-is'bir inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun wa-is'taghfir lidhanbika wasabbih bihamdi rabbika bil-'ashiyi wal-ib'kari
ayah_english: So be patient indeed (the) Promise of Allah (the) Promise of Allah (is) true And ask forgiveness for your sin and glorify (the) praise (of) your Lord in the evening and the morning

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ سُلۡطَٰنٍ أَتَىٰهُمۡ إِن فِي صُدُورِهِمۡ إِلَّا كِبۡرٞ مَّا هُم بِبَٰلِغِيهِۚ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡبَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina yujadiluna fi ayati al-lahi bighayri sul'tanin atahum in fi sudurihim illa kib'run ma hum bibalighihi fa-is'ta'idh bil-lahi innahu huwa al-sami'u al-basiru
ayah_english: Indeed those who dispute concerning (the) Signs (of) Allah without any authority (which) came to them not (is) in their breasts but greatness not they (can) reach it So seek refuge in Allah Indeed He He (is) the All-Hearer the All-Seer

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ سُلۡطَٰنٍ أَتَىٰهُمۡ إِن فِي صُدُورِهِمۡ إِلَّا كِبۡرٞ مَّا هُم بِبَٰلِغِيهِۚ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡبَصِيرُ

ayah_english: Indeed those who dispute concerning (the) Signs (of) Allah without any authority (which) came to them not (is) in their breasts but greatness not they (can) reach it So seek refuge in Allah Indeed He He (is) the All-Hearer the All-Seer

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ سُلۡطَٰنٍ أَتَىٰهُمۡ إِن فِي صُدُورِهِمۡ إِلَّا كِبۡرٞ مَّا هُم بِبَٰلِغِيهِۚ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡبَصِيرُ

ayah_english: Indeed those who dispute concerning (the) Signs (of) Allah without any authority (which) came to them not (is) in their breasts but greatness not they (can) reach it So seek refuge in Allah Indeed He He (is) the All-Hearer the All-Seer

ayah: لَخَلۡقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَكۡبَرُ مِنۡ خَلۡقِ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: lakhalqu al-samawati wal-ardi akbaru min khalqi al-nasi walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: Surely (the) creation (of) the heavens and the earth (is) greater than (the) creation (of) the mankind but most (of) the people (do) not know

ayah: لَخَلۡقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَكۡبَرُ مِنۡ خَلۡقِ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: لَخَلۡقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَكۡبَرُ مِنۡ خَلۡقِ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: lakhalqu al-samawati wal-ardi akbaru min khalqi al-nasi walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: Surely (the) creation (of) the heavens and the earth (is) greater than (the) creation (of) the mankind but most (of) the people (do) not know

ayah: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَٱلۡبَصِيرُ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَلَا ٱلۡمُسِيٓءُۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: wama yastawi al-a'ma wal-basiru wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati wala al-musiu qalilan ma tatadhakkaruna
ayah_english: And not are equal the blind and the seeing and those who believe and do righteous deeds and not the evildoer Little (is) what you take heed

ayah: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَٱلۡبَصِيرُ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَلَا ٱلۡمُسِيٓءُۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَتَذَكَّرُونَ

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: inna al-sa'ata laatiyatun la rayba fiha walakinna akthara al-nasi la yu'minuna
ayah_english: Indeed the Hour (is) surely coming no doubt in it but most (of) the people (do) not believe

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

ayah: وَقَالَ رَبُّكُمُ ٱدۡعُونِيٓ أَسۡتَجِبۡ لَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِي سَيَدۡخُلُونَ جَهَنَّمَ دَاخِرِينَ
ayah_translit: waqala rabbukumu id'uni astajib lakum inna alladhina yastakbiruna an ibadati sayadkhuluna jahannama dakhirina
ayah_english: And said your Lord Call upon Me I will respond to you Indeed those who (are too) proud to worship Me will enter Hell (in) humiliation

ayah: وَقَالَ رَبُّكُمُ ٱدۡعُونِيٓ أَسۡتَجِبۡ لَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِي سَيَدۡخُلُونَ جَهَنَّمَ دَاخِرِينَ

ayah: وَقَالَ رَبُّكُمُ ٱدۡعُونِيٓ أَسۡتَجِبۡ لَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِي سَيَدۡخُلُونَ جَهَنَّمَ دَاخِرِينَ
ayah_translit: waqala rabbukumu id'uni astajib lakum inna alladhina yastakbiruna an ibadati sayadkhuluna jahannama dakhirina
ayah_english: And said your Lord Call upon Me I will respond to you Indeed those who (are too) proud to worship Me will enter Hell (in) humiliation

ayah_english: And said your Lord Call upon Me I will respond to you Indeed those who (are too) proud to worship Me will enter Hell (in) humiliation

ayah: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ لِتَسۡكُنُواْ فِيهِ وَٱلنَّهَارَ مُبۡصِرًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: al-lahu alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-layla litaskunu fihi wal-nahara mub'siran inna al-laha ladhu fadlin ala al-nasi walakinna akthara al-nasi la yashkuruna
ayah_english: Allah (is) the One Who made for you the night that you may rest in it and the day giving visibility Indeed Allah (is) Full (of) Bounty (is) Full (of) Bounty to the people but most (of) the people (do) not give thanks

ayah: ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ
ayah_translit: dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum khaliqu kulli shayin la ilaha illa huwa fa-anna tu'fakuna
ayah_english: That (is) Allah your Lord (the) Creator (of) all things (there is) no god except Him So how are you deluded

ayah: ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ
ayah_translit: dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum khaliqu kulli shayin la ilaha illa huwa fa-anna tu'fakuna
ayah_english: That (is) Allah your Lord (the) Creator (of) all things (there is) no god except Him So how are you deluded

ayah: كَذَٰلِكَ يُؤۡفَكُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ
ayah_translit: kadhalika yu'faku alladhina kanu biayati al-lahi yajhaduna
ayah_english: Thus were deluded those who were (the) Signs (of) Allah rejecting

ayah: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ قَرَارٗا وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بِنَآءٗ وَصَوَّرَكُمۡ فَأَحۡسَنَ صُوَرَكُمۡ وَرَزَقَكُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡۖ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: al-lahu alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-arda qararan wal-samaa binaan wasawwarakum fa-ahsana suwarakum warazaqakum mina al-tayibati dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum fatabaraka al-lahu rabbu al-'alamina
ayah_english: Allah (is) the One Who made for you the earth a place of settlement and the sky a canopy and He formed you and perfected your forms and provided you of the good things That (is) Allah your Lord Then blessed is Allah (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ قَرَارٗا وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بِنَآءٗ وَصَوَّرَكُمۡ فَأَحۡسَنَ صُوَرَكُمۡ وَرَزَقَكُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡۖ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ قَرَارٗا وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بِنَآءٗ وَصَوَّرَكُمۡ فَأَحۡسَنَ صُوَرَكُمۡ وَرَزَقَكُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡۖ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah_english: Allah (is) the One Who made for you the earth a place of settlement and the sky a canopy and He formed you and perfected your forms and provided you of the good things That (is) Allah your Lord Then blessed is Allah (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱدۡعُوهُ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَۗ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: huwa al-hayu la ilaha illa huwa fa-id'uhu mukh'lisina lahu al-dina al-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: He (is) the Ever-Living (there is) no god but He so call Him (being) sincere to Him (in) the religion All praise (be) to Allah (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: ۞قُلۡ إِنِّي نُهِيتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَمَّا جَآءَنِيَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُ مِن رَّبِّي وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أُسۡلِمَ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: qul inni nuhitu an a'buda alladhina tad'una min duni al-lahi lamma jaaniya al-bayinatu min rabbi wa-umir'tu an us'lima lirabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: Say Indeed, I [I] have been forbidden to worship those whom you call besides besides Allah when have come to me the clear proofs from my Lord and I am commanded to submit to (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: ۞قُلۡ إِنِّي نُهِيتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَمَّا جَآءَنِيَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُ مِن رَّبِّي وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أُسۡلِمَ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah_english: Say Indeed, I [I] have been forbidden to worship those whom you call besides besides Allah when have come to me the clear proofs from my Lord and I am commanded to submit to (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah_translit: qul inni nuhitu an a'buda alladhina tad'una min duni al-lahi lamma jaaniya al-bayinatu min rabbi wa-umir'tu an us'lima lirabbi al-'alamina

ayah_english: Say Indeed, I [I] have been forbidden to worship those whom you call besides besides Allah when have come to me the clear proofs from my Lord and I am commanded to submit to (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ ثُمَّ مِنۡ عَلَقَةٖ ثُمَّ يُخۡرِجُكُمۡ طِفۡلٗا ثُمَّ لِتَبۡلُغُوٓاْ أَشُدَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ لِتَكُونُواْ شُيُوخٗاۚ وَمِنكُم مَّن يُتَوَفَّىٰ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلِتَبۡلُغُوٓاْ أَجَلٗا مُّسَمّٗى وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi khalaqakum min turabin thumma min nut'fatin thumma min alaqatin thumma yukh'rijukum tif'lan thumma litablughu ashuddakum thumma litakunu shuyukhan waminkum man yutawaffa min qablu walitablughu ajalan musamman wala'allakum ta'qiluna
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who created you from dust then from a sperm-drop then from a clinging substance then He brings you out (as) a child then lets you reach your maturity then lets you become old and among you (is he) who dies before before and lets you reach a term specified and that you may use reason

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ ثُمَّ مِنۡ عَلَقَةٖ ثُمَّ يُخۡرِجُكُمۡ طِفۡلٗا ثُمَّ لِتَبۡلُغُوٓاْ أَشُدَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ لِتَكُونُواْ شُيُوخٗاۚ وَمِنكُم مَّن يُتَوَفَّىٰ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلِتَبۡلُغُوٓاْ أَجَلٗا مُّسَمّٗى وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ ثُمَّ مِنۡ عَلَقَةٖ ثُمَّ يُخۡرِجُكُمۡ طِفۡلٗا ثُمَّ لِتَبۡلُغُوٓاْ أَشُدَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ لِتَكُونُواْ شُيُوخٗاۚ وَمِنكُم مَّن يُتَوَفَّىٰ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلِتَبۡلُغُوٓاْ أَجَلٗا مُّسَمّٗى وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ فَإِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمۡرٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi yuh'yi wayumitu fa-idha qada amran fa-innama yaqulu lahu kun fayakunu
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who gives life and causes death And when He decrees a matter then only He says to it Be and it is

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أَنَّىٰ يُصۡرَفُونَ
ayah_translit: alam tara ila alladhina yujadiluna fi ayati al-lahi anna yus'rafuna
ayah_english: Do not you see [to] those who dispute concerning (the) Signs (of) Allah How they are turned away

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أَنَّىٰ يُصۡرَفُونَ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَبِمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا بِهِۦ رُسُلَنَاۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina kadhabu bil-kitabi wabima arsalna bihi rusulana fasawfa ya'lamuna
ayah_english: Those who deny the Book and with what We sent with it Our Messengers but soon they will know

ayah: إِذِ ٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلُ فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ وَٱلسَّلَٰسِلُ يُسۡحَبُونَ
ayah_translit: idhi al-aghlalu fi a'naqihim wal-salasilu yus'habuna

ayah_translit: fi al-hamimi thumma fi al-nari yus'jaruna
ayah_english: In the boiling water then in the Fire they will be burned

ayah: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma qila lahum ayna ma kuntum tush'rikuna
ayah_english: Then it will be said to them Where (is) that which you used (to) associate

ayah: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ قَالُواْ ضَلُّواْ عَنَّا بَل لَّمۡ نَكُن نَّدۡعُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: min duni al-lahi qalu dallu anna bal lam nakun nad'u min qablu shayan kadhalika yudillu al-lahu al-kafirina
ayah_english: Other than Other than Allah They will say They have departed from us Nay Not we used [we] (to) call before before anything Thus Allah lets go astray Allah lets go astray the disbelievers

ayah: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ قَالُواْ ضَلُّواْ عَنَّا بَل لَّمۡ نَكُن نَّدۡعُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

ayah: ذَٰلِكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَفۡرَحُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَمۡرَحُونَ
ayah_translit: dhalikum bima kuntum tafrahuna fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi wabima kuntum tamrahuna
ayah_english: That was because you used (to) rejoice in the earth without right and because you used (to) be insolent

ayah: ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
ayah_translit: ud'khulu abwaba jahannama khalidina fiha fabi'sa mathwa al-mutakabirina
ayah_english: Enter (the) gates (of) Hell (to) abide forever in it and wretched is (the) abode (of) the arrogant

ayah: فَٱصۡبِرۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۚ فَإِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-is'bir inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun fa-imma nuriyannaka ba'da alladhi na'iduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilayna yur'ja'una
ayah_english: So be patient indeed (the) Promise (of) Allah (is) true And whether We show you some (of) what We have promised them or We cause you to die then to Us they will be returned

ayah_translit: fa-is'bir inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun fa-imma nuriyannaka ba'da alladhi na'iduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilayna yur'ja'una
ayah_english: So be patient indeed (the) Promise (of) Allah (is) true And whether We show you some (of) what We have promised them or We cause you to die then to Us they will be returned

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلٗا مِّن قَبۡلِكَ مِنۡهُم مَّن قَصَصۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن لَّمۡ نَقۡصُصۡ عَلَيۡكَۗ وَمَا كَانَ لِرَسُولٍ أَن يَأۡتِيَ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ قُضِيَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَخَسِرَ هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna rusulan min qablika min'hum man qasasna alayka wamin'hum man lam naqsus alayka wama kana lirasulin an yatiya biayatin illa bi-idh'ni al-lahi fa-idha jaa amru al-lahi qudiya bil-haqi wakhasira hunalika al-mub'tiluna

ayah_english: And certainly We have sent Messengers before you before you Among them (are) some We have related to you and among them (are) some not We have related to you And not is for any Messenger that he brings a Sign except by (the) permission (of) Allah So when comes (the) Command (of) Allah it will be decided in truth and will lose there the falsifiers

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلٗا مِّن قَبۡلِكَ مِنۡهُم مَّن قَصَصۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن لَّمۡ نَقۡصُصۡ عَلَيۡكَۗ وَمَا كَانَ لِرَسُولٍ أَن يَأۡتِيَ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ قُضِيَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَخَسِرَ هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ

ayah: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ لِتَرۡكَبُواْ مِنۡهَا وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
ayah_translit: al-lahu alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-an'ama litarkabu min'ha wamin'ha takuluna
ayah_english: Allah (is) the One Who made for you the cattle that you may ride some of them and some of them you eat

ayah: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَلِتَبۡلُغُواْ عَلَيۡهَا حَاجَةٗ فِي صُدُورِكُمۡ وَعَلَيۡهَا وَعَلَى ٱلۡفُلۡكِ تُحۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: walakum fiha manafi'u walitablughu alayha hajatan fi sudurikum wa'alayha wa'ala al-ful'ki tuh'maluna
ayah_english: And for you in them (are) benefits and that you may reach through them a need (that is) in your breasts and upon them and upon the ships you are carried

ayah: وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَأَيَّ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُنكِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wayurikum ayatihi fa-ayya ayati al-lahi tunkiruna
ayah_english: And He shows you His Signs Then which (of the) Signs (of) Allah will you deny

ayah: وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَأَيَّ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُنكِرُونَ

ayah: أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَانُوٓاْ أَكۡثَرَ مِنۡهُمۡ وَأَشَدَّ قُوَّةٗ وَءَاثَارٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
ayah_translit: afalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablihim kanu akthara min'hum wa-ashadda quwwatan waatharan fi al-ardi fama aghna anhum ma kanu yaksibuna
ayah_english: Do they not travel through the land and see how was (the) end (of) those who (were) before them (were) before them They were more numerous than them and mightier (in) strength and impressions in the land but not availed them what they used (to) earn

ayah: أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَانُوٓاْ أَكۡثَرَ مِنۡهُمۡ وَأَشَدَّ قُوَّةٗ وَءَاثَارٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

ayah: أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَانُوٓاْ أَكۡثَرَ مِنۡهُمۡ وَأَشَدَّ قُوَّةٗ وَءَاثَارٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَرِحُواْ بِمَا عِندَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعِلۡمِ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma jaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati farihu bima indahum mina al-'il'mi wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
ayah_english: Then when came to them their Messengers with clear proofs they rejoiced in what they had of the knowledge and enveloped them what they used (to) [at it] mock

ayah: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡاْ بَأۡسَنَا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَحۡدَهُۥ وَكَفَرۡنَا بِمَا كُنَّا بِهِۦ مُشۡرِكِينَ
ayah_translit: falamma ra-aw basana qalu amanna bil-lahi wahdahu wakafarna bima kunna bihi mush'rikina
ayah_english: So when they saw Our punishment they said We believe in Allah Alone and we disbelieve in what we used (to) with Him associate

ayah: فَلَمۡ يَكُ يَنفَعُهُمۡ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ لَمَّا رَأَوۡاْ بَأۡسَنَاۖ سُنَّتَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ فِي عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَخَسِرَ هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: falam yaku yanfa'uhum imanuhum lamma ra-aw basana sunnata al-lahi allati qad khalat fi ibadihi wakhasira hunalika al-kafiruna
ayah_english: But did not But did not benefit them their faith when they saw Our punishment (Such is the) Way (of) Allah which (has) indeed preceded among His slaves And are lost there the disbelievers

ayah: فَلَمۡ يَكُ يَنفَعُهُمۡ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ لَمَّا رَأَوۡاْ بَأۡسَنَاۖ سُنَّتَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ فِي عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَخَسِرَ هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

ayah: فَلَمۡ يَكُ يَنفَعُهُمۡ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ لَمَّا رَأَوۡاْ بَأۡسَنَاۖ سُنَّتَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ فِي عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَخَسِرَ هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
